website_summaries.verdict: Many dedicated customers praise this product for living up to its promise of effectively removing most stains and odors.
pros: Has become a trusted product among pet owners for its reliability at removing all types of animal stains and odors with natural enzymes
1-gallon size for a reasonable price makes it a good value
cons: Some tough urine odors may require several applications to thoroughly remove, but most are eventually eliminated

customer_reviews.title: Best Urine And Everything Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered twice now. The fragrance is also very pleasant and very clean too. I specifically use it for kitty urine and there's no lingering pee smell. I purchased 2 gallons this time, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: G.S

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to count the number of times Nature's Miracle has helped me out with dog 'issues!' A wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E. Van Kraats

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to work well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not purfect, but after two applications this seemed to help clean up the " YELLOW SPOTS", in the house. I have one dog that was most of her life kept in a kennel to have puppies, and then thrown away. She is wonderful loving, but she doesn't understand where to go. She just squats wherever and whenever. So, I have to do lots of clean up around the house. This product seem to be the most effective of the many I have used in the past, thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: This spray works great. We have a puppy we are housebreaking and we use this spray to clean up after all accidents. I wanted a cleaner that would break down the enzymes to avoid her choosing a spot in the house to go and so far this has gotten the job done. We haven't had any stains left behind after using this and it removes odors, leaving a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Vic S

customer_reviews.title: Great for sloppy winos (you know who you are)
customer_reviews.text: After I broke a bottle of (expensive) red wine on our carpeted stairs, a neighbor recommended this product to clean up the mess (which I'd allowed to sit for weeks, unsure of what to use). It worked AMAZINGLY well! There's no trace left on our beige plush carpet! (I was sober when I checked.)
customer_reviews.author: Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff and a gallon comes in hamdy
customer_reviews.text: Love that stuff. I usually pour some on the floor and brush it in and let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: claudia p.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: We used this product. It works as it is described.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKE THIS PRODUCT WORKED GOOD ON NEW PET STAINS AND EVEN OLDER ONES THE ONLY PROBLEM WAS THAT THE WHITE COVER CAP COMES IN A SEPERATE PLASTIC WRAP THAT YOU PUT OVER THE SPRAY BOTTLE THAT WAS BROKEN IN A NUMBER OF PIECES,BUT IT WORKS WITHOUT THAT PART AS LONG AS IT SQUIRTS OUT I AM HAPPY.MINUS 1 STAR FOR THE BROKEN CAP
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for dealing with smells left in your carpet after a pet has had an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Feil

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: Great smell!! A must for anyone potty training a new puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use anything else for animal cleanups !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, anyone with a cat, you will appreciate the cleanup after a hairball, or as they get older the occasional accident.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product for removing pet accidents
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for removing pet accidents. The scent is heavenly AND it takes the odor away from the surface and the air...thank goodness for that!!
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: ... does not have a harsh smell and does a good job. Much cheaper here online than in stores
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner does not have a harsh smell and does a good job. Much cheaper here online than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works for my dog's urine...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 yr old Chihuahua with on Lasix, a diuretic, for heart disease. This makes him urinate every couple of hours like a Great Dane! During the day it's not a problem, but at night he pees on more than just his pee pads. This stuff is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: den

customer_reviews.title: It simply works
customer_reviews.text: This is the one product that we have found that works
customer_reviews.author: Keith B. Britany

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: My cat throws up lots of hair balls and this takes care of the stains really well. Even the occasional accident here and there. And smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Shadi M

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This I the only product that I have found that removes the stains an odors and it now smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect refill solution for stinky doggy bathroom areas
customer_reviews.text: Got sick of buying the smaller bottles.. now we can refill our old spray bottle and save some cash.
customer_reviews.author: DevoRAnd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good at removing stains but great at removing the smell!
customer_reviews.author: KGG

customer_reviews.title: and smells pretty good itself
customer_reviews.text: This eliminates all puppy odors and stains, and smells pretty good itself. It's near-on magical.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I just wish it came as a concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever for cleaning the pee on the floors ...
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever for cleaning the pee on the floors and carpet. Would never know there was a puppy in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Reilly

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Scented Stain & Odor Remover, 32-Ounce
product_meta.description: Scent:Flowering Meadow| Size:1-GallonNature's Miracle - flowering meadows scent stain & odor Remover. A bio-enzymatic formula designed to remove urine, feces, drool, vomit and other pet messes. For use on carpets, floors, furniture, clothing and more. to permanently eliminate stain and odors. 1 gallon
feature_bullets: Scented Stain And Odor Removers Combine The Power Of Much-Loved Original Formula With Pleasing Fragrances
Removes Stains And Odors Caused By Foods, Blood, Vomit, Urine, Feces, Grease, Dirt, Grass, Smoke, Perspiration
It features new flowering meadow scent eliminates urine odors with no perfume cover-up
Used On Carpets, Hard Surfaces, Clothing, Kennels And Carriers
